answer.text: Canvas is a web application that allows EY auditors to manage and document their audit work in a structured and efficient manner.
Canvas serves as the central platform for audit documentation, workflow management, and collaboration among audit teams.

title: How many developers are working on Canvas?

answer.text: As of now, there are 210 developers working on Canvas.
The Canvas development team consists of 210 developers across multiple locations and specializations.
Hercules is a web.api project name which serves the middle layer for main canvas application.
Hercules acts as the API gateway and middleware that handles communication between Canvas frontend and backend services.
It provides data processing, authentication, and business logic layer for the Canvas ecosystem.

title: What is azure resource group for UAT3 norway?
What is the main focus of the Hercules project?

answer.text: The main focus of the Hercules project is to provide a robust and efficient API layer that supports the functionality of the Canvas application.
Hercules focuses on scalability, performance optimization, and maintaining secure communication channels for Canvas operations.
